trans-unit.source: Implements a cryptographic Random Number Generator (RNG) using the implementation provided by the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 实现加密随机数生成器 (RNG) 使用加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 提供的实现。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
This method does not directly initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor and passing `null`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数并传递`null`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte array.
This value is ignored.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider"></xref>使用指定的参数的类。

trans-unit.source: The parameters to pass to the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: 要传递给加密服务提供商 (CSP) 的参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
This method does not directly initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider> class.
Calling this method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor and passing `null`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法等效于调用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数并传递`null`。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string input.
This parameter is ignored.
To be added.
Fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong sequence of random values.
trans-unit.target: 用加密型强随机值序列填充字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The length of the byte array determines how many cryptographically strong random bytes are produced.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组的长度确定生成加密型强随机字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe.
The array to fill with a cryptographically strong sequence of random values.
trans-unit.target: 要用加密型强随机值序列填充的数组。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 无法获取加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: data is .
Fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong sequence of random nonzero values.
trans-unit.target: 用加密型强随机非零值序列填充字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The length of the byte array determines how many cryptographically strong random nonzero bytes are produced.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组的长度确定生成多少加密型强随机非零字节。

trans-unit.source: The array to fill with a cryptographically strong sequence of random nonzero values.
trans-unit.target: 要用加密型强随机非零值序列填充的数组。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: 无法获取加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

trans-unit.source: data is .
